fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: * Cause a moderror within someone else. Sometime this game they will get a moderror

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: * At the start of the game you will be told a faction.

fields.name: Addendum:
fields.value: * You may exchange this role for a draft of 3 roles from the same slot for free

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Have the faction, you have been informed of, loose.
